MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat MakeCustomAnimation (Android.Content.Context context, int enterResId, int exitResId);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat MakeCustomAnimation(class Android.Content.Context context, int32 enterResId, int32 exitResId) cil managed

Docs.param: Who is defining this. This is the application that the animation resources will be loaded from.
A resource ID of the animation resource to use for the incoming activity. Use 0 for no animation.
A resource ID of the animation resource to use for the outgoing activity. Use 0 for no animation.
Docs.summary: Create an ActivityOptions specifying a custom animation to run when the activity is displayed.

remarks.para: Create an ActivityOptions specifying a custom animation to run when the activity is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat MakeScaleUpAnimation (Android.Views.View source, int startX, int startY, int startWidth, int startHeight);

.method public static hidebysig class Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat MakeScaleUpAnimation(class Android.Views.View source, int32 startX, int32 startY, int32 startWidth, int32 startHeight) cil managed

Docs.param: The View that the new activity is animating from. This defines the coordinate space for startX and startY.
The x starting location of the new activity, relative to source.
The y starting location of the activity, relative to source.
The initial width of the new activity.
The initial height of the new activity.
Docs.summary: Create an ActivityOptions specifying an animation where the new activity is scaled from a small originating area of the screen to its final full representation.

remarks.para: Create an ActivityOptions specifying an animation where the new activity is scaled from a small originating area of the screen to its final full representation.
If the Intent this is being used with has not set its , those bounds will be filled in for you based on the initial bounds passed in here.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat MakeThumbnailScaleUpAnimation (Android.Views.View source, Android.Graphics.Bitmap thumbnail, int startX, int startY);

.method public static hidebysig class Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat MakeThumbnailScaleUpAnimation(class Android.Views.View source, class Android.Graphics.Bitmap thumbnail, int32 startX, int32 startY) cil managed

Docs.param: The View that this thumbnail is animating from. This defines the coordinate space for startX and startY.
The bitmap that will be shown as the initial thumbnail of the animation.
The x starting location of the bitmap, relative to source.
The y starting location of the bitmap, relative to source.
Docs.summary: Create an ActivityOptions specifying an animation where a thumbnail is scaled from a given position to the new activity window that is being started.

remarks.para: Create an ActivityOptions specifying an animation where a thumbnail is scaled from a given position to the new activity window that is being started.
If the Intent this is being used with has not set its , those bounds will be filled in for you based on the initial thumbnail location and size provided here.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.OS.Bundle ToBundle() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the created options as a Bundle, which can be passed to .

remarks.para: Returns the created options as a Bundle, which can be passed to . Note that the returned Bundle is still owned by the ActivityOptions object; you must not modify it, but can supply it to the startActivity methods that take an options Bundle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Update(class Android.Support.V4.App.ActivityOptionsCompat otherOptions) cil managed

Docs.summary: Update the current values in this ActivityOptions from those supplied in otherOptions.

remarks.para: Update the current values in this ActivityOptions from those supplied in otherOptions. Any values defined in otherOptions replace those in the base options.
